duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and implement medium/large scale Data Warehouse solutions as a data architect.
Utilize GCP Cloud Native ETL/ELT services, with deep understanding of BigQuery and Dataform.
Operationalize large scale data ingestion, processing, and consumption using dataflow or cloud fusion.
Ingest data through API’s or integration tools such as Mulesoft or Boomi.
Employ storage infrastructure, event-based architecture, monitoring, logging, auditing services of GCP.
Orchestrate data using Cloud Functions, Cloud Composer, Apache Airflow or related tools.
Integrate Cortex framework on GCP with SAP and Networking on GCP with Gateway connectivity.
